mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb (target_type, target_id, user_id, content, create_dt, update_dt) values (#{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{userId}, #{content}, now(), null)
mapper.select:
select ct.comment_id, ct.target_type, ct.target_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, rt.title as title, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id
left join recipe_tb rt on rt.recipe_id = ct.target_id and ct.target_type = 'RECIPE' where ct.target_type = #{targetType} and ct.target_id = #{targetId} order by ct.comment_id desc

select ct.comment_id, ct.target_type, ct.target_id, ct.user_id, ut.username, rt.title as title, ct.content, ct.create_dt, ct.update_dt from comment_tb ct join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ct.user_id left join recipe_tb rt on rt.recipe_id = ct.target_id and ct.target_type = 'RECIPE' where ct.user_id = #{userId} order by ct.comment_id desc
